amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary to provide an expedited process for TIFIA applications that are less than $100 million and backed by revenue.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 13 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to add a new section entitled Streamlined Application Process for securing secured loans under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Larsen (WA) amendment (A055) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Larsen (WA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Larsen (WA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
